Title: Requires the provision of paid family leave and certain other employee benefits when an employee is under a mandatory or precautionary order of medically-necessary quarantine or isolation
Summary: Requires the provision of paid family leave and certain other employee benefits when an employee is under a mandatory or precautionary order of medically-necessary quarantine or isolation issued by the department of health.
LawCode: Add ยง203-d, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing requirements for sick leave and the provision of certain employee benefits when such employee is subject to a mandatory or precautionary order of medically-necessary quarantine or isolation
